about_the_game:
unlock the Elements

NATURE'S ELEMENT is a fighting game where you control the natural elements. By using specific gestures in Virtual Reality you can summon, control, and reflect the elements around you, bending them to your will.




Mother Nature has assigned you as the defender of the "Nature Gate" - a portal between the physical world and her domain!
You must use your new elemental powers of Air, Earth, Water, and Fire to defend the gate from your enemies - lest they break the link between Mother Nature and the physical world!

As you master your abilities you will discover new moves, control the environment around you , and strengthen your abilities as you prepare to take on hidden evil!

Learn the movements, and their effects, and defend the world in Nature's Element!

name: Nature's Element

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: HTC Vive (More coming soon)

short_description: Defend Mother Nature's Realm! Become the "Element" and unlock the power of Air, Water, Earth, and Fire as you punch, pull, push, block, and redirect elemental chaos to stop your enemies from destroying the Natural realm!
